subject: Re: mr. almighty(mouse) is clueless!
author: Misty
full_text:
That one looks pretty nice! I agree they all have noise but often thats what spirit uses to make themselves heard.

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> The TRF boxes are home made radios, even the glorious Radio Shack radio are
> plagued by noise when swept. You don't get so much in the hack boxes cuz
> you're jumping 10khz increments, skipping over the noise that's present when
> the things are continuously swept.
> 
>  Frank-s
>
